item.title: Northern Lights Acquisition Corp S-1
item.description: Northern Lights Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on June 02, 2021 had 79395 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1913 instances combination - 1340 instances initial - 1189 instances may - 1083 instances shares - 986 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
